trans-unit.target: 無効<tab>無効
Adventure:<tab>Wander whither the winds take thee.
<tab>Seek out sights thou hast yet to behold.
<tab>Travel to lands held dear in thy heart.
<tab>Thou shalt be blessed with the weather.
<tab>Auspicious encounters await amidst the hustle and bustle of cities.
<tab>Forget not to take thy repasts, for thou shalt be blessed with encounters most auspicious.
<tab>Shirk not the offers of the august, for proffered hands forge new bonds.
Relationships:<tab>Answer the call, and trust and honor accorded to heroes shall be thine.
<tab>Cast thy gaze upon bonds eternal, for therein lie great blessings.
<tab>To thy companions thou shalt be indebted. Forget not to express thine appreciation.
<tab>A star-guided companion is closer than thou knowest.
<tab>Fortunate are those who do not stray from their friends.
Prosperity:<tab>Cast aside thy greed, and thou shalt reap the spoils of numbers great.
<tab>Upon thee luck shall smile. Seek riches in gilded halls.
<tab>A treasure map thou shouldst unfurl. Unto great fortune it shall lead thee.
<tab>All shall be to thy desire. Throw open coffers without fear.
<tab>Profit shall come. Be honest in thy business dealings.
Conflict:<tab>Take to battle with confidence. Each mighty foe shall see thee grow.
<tab>Beyond repetition lieth truth. Neglect not thy training.
<tab>Look to thy comrades-in-arms. Much have they to teach thee.
<tab>Great opportunities for growth lie in fields yet unexplored.
<tab>Beyond repetition lieth truth. Neglect not thy training.
Favor:<tab>Be fierce like unto the Fury, and victory shall be assured thee.
<tab>Be kind like unto the Lover, and thou shalt receive kindness in return.
<tab>Be passionate like unto the Warden, and the way shall be illuminated for thee.
<tab>Be decisive like unto the Navigator, and serendipitous winds shall bear thee high.
<tab>Be inquisitive like unto the Wanderer, and thou shalt find much joy in thy journeys.
Adventure:<tab>Hither and thither wander alone. Enjoy moments of respite all thine own.
<tab>Embark upon an old journey anew. Further discoveries await.
<tab>Participate in festivities and feel the turning of the seasons.
<tab>Heed the voices of the people, for they have tales untold to share.
<tab>Unexpected discoveries await in unexplored lands.
<tab>Remain true to thyself, and new encounters shall follow.
<tab>Opportunity awaiteth in lands blessed by golden dawn.
Relationships:<tab>Be prepared for unexpected encounters.
<tab>From an unlikely meeting a relationship shall bloom.
<tab>Friendship will bloom. Take the lead and gather comrades.
<tab>A friend shall come to thine aid. Neglect not to repay the debt.
<tab>Though slow to ripen, the sweetest of fruits await.
Prosperity:<tab>Great riches await in gilded halls. Be open-handed.
<tab>Sail forth and cast thy nets. A great haul awaits thee.
<tab>Invest in thy home. From it fortune shall grow.
<tab>Bid farewell to the old; bid welcome to the new.
<tab>Stay alert to opportunity, and thou shalt make thy fortune.
Conflict:<tab>Temper thyself in the heat of friendly rivalries.
<tab>Thy weapon suiteth thee well. Continue in thine efforts with confidence.
<tab>The tiles favor thee. Try thy hand at mahjong.
<tab>In the pursuit of fell fiends far and wide, thou shalt find good fortune.
<tab>Thy weapon suiteth thee well. Continue in thine efforts with confidence.
Favor:<tab>Be wise like unto the Spinner, and fortune shall favor thee in all its domains.
<tab>Be bold like unto the Destroyer, and all foes shall fall before thee.
<tab>Be creative like unto the Builder, and a surer hand of craftsmanship shall be thine.
<tab>Be discerning like unto the Traders, and no chance to profit shall pass thee by.
<tab>Be forbearing like unto the Matron, and the seeds of new friendship shall quicken for thee.
Adventure:<tab>Stay true to thyself, and the way shall open for thee.
<tab>A case is afoot. Enlist the services of the most gentlemanly of inspectors.
<tab>Look closely at the weave of the lands thou seest, and thou shalt make new discoveries.
<tab>Gather thine allies, and embark upon a journey to remember.
<tab>Place thyself in fate's hand, and thou wilt surely grow.
<tab>Heed the whispers of nature. On a faraway island shall you find solace and sanctuary.
<tab>Rejoice in the Twelve, and thy revels shall not go unrewarded.
Relationships:<tab>Be ever grateful, and thou shalt know blessed friendship.
<tab>Thy comrades are thy treasures. Cherish them well.
<tab>From a foreign land cometh a kindred soul. Embrace them without reserve.
<tab>Where words fail to convey thy feelings, gestures may yet succeed.
<tab>Nothing good will come of waiting. Participate in a gathering hosted by adventurers.
Prosperity:<tab>Great success is the accumulation of small efforts. Neglect not thy daily chores.
<tab>Now is an auspicious time to find a new home. Seize the opportunity.
<tab>Great profits await reaping in the wilderness.
<tab>A chance for profit shall come by way of a friend.
<tab>Wealth lieth in the seas and skies. Send forth vessels to explore.
Conflict:<tab>Neglect not thy provisions, and victory shall be thine.
<tab>A grueling battle awaiteth. Reassess thine equipment.
<tab>Dwell not overmuch in sweet victory, or bitter defeat shall follow.
<tab>For strength thou wantest not. Thou needest but breathe as one with thine allies.
<tab>For strength thou wantest not. Thou needest but breathe as one with thine allies.
Favor:<tab>Be steadfast like unto the Keeper, and thou shalt not be led astray.
<tab>Be wise like unto the Scholar, and thou shalt find a way to overcome misfortune.
<tab>Be resolute like unto the Fury, and thou shalt know no surrender.
<tab>Be observant like unto the Lover, and thou shalt see all things for what they are.
<tab>Be audacious like unto the Warden, and thy comrades shall follow thee true.
Adventure:<tab>Know thy destination before thou embarkest upon thy journey.
<tab>Hearken to the pleas of those in need, no matter their race or creed.
<tab>Seek fortune along the byway.
<tab>Alone thou shalt struggle. Set forth with allies.
<tab>Behold once more the first city thou didst see. There, good fortune awaiteth thee.
<tab>In the land of the fierce shall thine abilities be tested. Bring thy full might to bear.
<tab>Forge thy weapons anew, for thy pursuits shall reveal untold strength.
Relationships:<tab>Neglect not to stay in touch with loved ones, and all shall be well.
<tab>A face from thy past shall appear. Rekindle thy friendship.
<tab>There shall be a meeting long in the making. Abide in patience.
<tab>Help those in need, and friendship shall bloom.
<tab>Cherish the bonds with which thou art blessed, and strive to strengthen them.
Prosperity:<tab>Now is the time to sell. The longer thou waitest, the greater thy loss.
<tab>Put thy belongings in order.
<tab>If thou fearest not to lose, thou shalt stand to gain.
<tab>Although it be at great expense, thou shalt obtain the object of thy desire.
<tab>Thou shalt gain through the help of thy friends.
Conflict:<tab>Although thou shalt fall, thou shalt rise up stronger each time.
<tab>Be not complacent. Remain vigilant from beginning to end.
<tab>Cast aside idle thoughts, and focus wholly on that which requireth thine attention.
<tab>Continue honing thyself with thine allies.
<tab>Continue honing thyself with thine allies.
Favor:<tab>Be boisterous like unto the Navigator, and from fate's tides thou mayest yet break free.
<tab>Be carefree like unto the Wanderer, and some few failures shall not discourage thee.
<tab>Be farsighted like unto the Spinner, and thou shalt rise above the caprices of fortune.
<tab>Be unyielding like unto the Destroyer, and thou shalt break through any hardship.
<tab>Be dextrous like unto the Builder, and thy tools shall never fail thee.
Adventure:<tab>Neglect not to lay plans.
<tab>Thine excesses shall take their toll. Pay thy health due care on the road.
<tab>Whiskered fish shall impede thy steps. Exercise due care.
<tab>The way is clear. Forge on with a calm heart.
<tab>The future holdeth disaster. Be as a light in the darkness to those around thee.
<tab>Thou shalt find repose where rabbits tread.
<tab>Renew thy spirit beyond the horizon.
Relationships:<tab>An old friend may become a new flame. Handle the fires of passion with care.
<tab>Thou shalt waver in the face of affection.
<tab>Trust in thy comrades. Heed not gossip and hearsay.
<tab>Forget not thy kindness in the midst of conflict.
<tab>With sincerity shalt thou allay misunderstanding.
Prosperity:<tab>Act not with emotion, lest thou misjudge an item's worth.
<tab>Games of chance do not favor thee. Abide in patience.
<tab>Fret not over excess stock. It shall not go to waste.
<tab>Good fortune awaiteth. Outfit thy retainers anew.
<tab>Thy nets shall be empty. If thou wouldst catch fish, watch well the tides.
Conflict:<tab>Be magnanimous in thine encounters.
<tab>Apprehension shall beget failure. Take to battle with naught save complete resolve.
<tab>Victory must not be rushed. Allow it to come in due course.
<tab>Even in victory, thy heart's desire shall elude thee. Perseverance is the key.
<tab>Even in victory, thy heart's desire shall elude thee. Perseverance is the key.
Favor:<tab>Like unto the Destroyer's bolt, misfortune may strike without warning. Be ever prepared.
<tab>To defeat adversity as unassailable as the Fury's shield, thou must strike with resolve unwavering.
<tab>To triumph over foes as ferocious as the Lover's loyal hound, thou must devise a stratagem.
<tab>To rise above hardship as tumultuous as the Navigator's raging waves, thou must bide thy time.
<tab>To resolve dilemmas as confounding as the Scholar's scrolls, thou must seek new wisdom.
Adventure:<tab>Thou shalt not be blessed with the weather. Abide in patience.
<tab>Be alert lest a celebration pass thee by.
<tab>Thou shalt be made to wait to sally forth. With apologies, pray abide in patience.
<tab>Think upon thy daily conduct, lest thou be incarcerated.
<tab>Beware the shooting star, for it bringeth destruction.
<tab>Fortune favors those who brave the shadows.
<tab>Hearken back to journeys past, for thy memories shall be thy strength.
Relationships:<tab>Thou shalt hear from the object of thine affection. Choose well thy words.
<tab>The flower is beyond thy reach. Seek it to thy sorrow.
<tab>Pursue not deeply, lest thou be bogged in a mire.
<tab>That which is said cannot be unsaid. Mind thy words.
<tab>Thou standest at a precipice. Act in good faith.
Prosperity:<tab>The greater thy desire, the smaller the prize. Clear thy mind.
<tab>A thief's map shall avail you not. Turn instead to that of thine allies.
<tab>Seek not profit in gilded halls. Let the amusement be its own reward.
<tab>The mightier the materia, the greater the risk. Purify thyself.
<tab>Now is not the time to collect tomestones.
Conflict:<tab>A dull blade is quick to break. Hone thyself well.
<tab>Cast aside idle thoughts, and focus wholly on that which requireth thine attention.
<tab>Shouldst thou struggle to advance, look to a different path.
<tab>In times of trial, allies must turn to each other for strength.
<tab>A dull blade is quick to break. Hone thyself well.
Favor:<tab>Shouldst thou pursue forbidden love like unto the Spinner, thou shalt walk the path of destruction.
<tab>Shouldst thou abide in duplicity like unto the Traders, thou shalt be lost to trust.
<tab>Unless thou castest aside thine anger like unto the Matron, thou shalt know no respite from conflict.
<tab>Unless thou embrace order like unto the Keeper, thy difficulties shall become graver still.
<tab>Shouldst thou cling to thine audacity like unto the Warden, thou shalt scorch those around thee.
